title: Wrapped in Winter - January Tracker

details.label: Completed Size
details.info: 4.0 x 4.0 inches or 10.2 x 10.2 cm on 14 count aida

story: The branch seemed almost made for the cat; each night he climbed up, warm scarf trailing softly behind, and nestled in as if the tree itself had saved this seat just for him.
